description.lang: AC Motor Controller for window coverings.Z-Wave AC motor control, packaged in a Plug & Play Box. Z-Wave radio allows for bi-directional RF communications with other Z-Wave products in the market. Allows for total switched load of up to 8 Amps at 115VAC / 4.9 Amps at 230VAC. Motor plug is included.By utilizing the Z-Wave standard, the ABMHZ is guaranteed interoperability between systems and devices from other Z-Wave enabled products.In order for scene functionality to operate correctly, the calibration sequence MUST be performed. See the technical documentation for more details.This product has passed a stringent conformance test to assure it meets the Z-Wave standard for complete interoperability with all other devices and controls.
